entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Halifax (Shearwater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shearwater Airport 09:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: -3.6°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then snow. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Blowing snow in the morning. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
